verses.verse: Michtam of David. Preserve <S%H8104><s%> me <S%H410><s%>, O God; For in thee do I take refuge <S%H2620><s%>.
O my soul <S%H559><s%>, thou hast said unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Thou art my Lord <S%H136><s%>: I have no good beyond thee <S%H2896><s%>.
As for the saints <S%H6918><s%> that <S%H1992><s%> are in the earth <S%H776><s%>, They are the excellent <S%H117><s%> in whom is all my delight <S%H2656><s%>.

Their sorrows <S%H6094><s%> shall be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> that give <S%H4116><s%> gifts for another <S%H312><s%> god <S%H5262><s%>: Their drink-offerings of blood <S%H1818><s%> will I not offer <S%H5258><s%>, Nor <S%H1077><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> upon my lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is the portion <S%H4490><s%> of mine inheritance <S%H2506><s%> and of my cup <S%H3563><s%>: Thou maintainest <S%H8551><s%> my lot <S%H1486><s%>.
The lines <S%H2256><s%> are fallen <S%H5307><s%> unto me in pleasant <S%H5273><s%> places <S%H8231><s%>; Yea, I have a goodly heritage <S%H5159><s%>.
I will bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who hath given me counsel <S%H3289><s%>; Yea <S%H3629><s%>, my heart instructeth <S%H3256><s%> me in the night seasons <S%H3915><s%>.
I have set <S%H7737><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> before me <S%H3225><s%>: Because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>.
Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> is glad <S%H8055><s%>, and my glory <S%H3519><s%> rejoiceth <S%H1523><s%>; My flesh <S%H1320><s%> also shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%>.
For thou wilt not leave <S%H5800><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%>; Neither wilt thou suffer <S%H5414><s%> thy holy one <S%H2623><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> corruption <S%H7845><s%>.

Thou wilt show <S%H3045><s%> me the path <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>: In thy presence <S%H6440><s%> is fulness <S%H7648><s%> of joy <S%H8057><s%>; In thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> there are pleasures <S%H5273><s%> for evermore <S%H5331><s%>.
